```scss
// Component(s): For the Animation Component
// Property(ies): rotate
'.rotate-0': { rotate: 0 }
'.rotate-1': { rotate: 1 }
'.rotate-2': { rotate: 2 }
'.rotate-3': { rotate: 3 }
'.rotate-6': { rotate: 6 }
'.rotate-12': { rotate: 12 }
'.rotate-45': { rotate: 45 }
'.rotate-90': { rotate: 90 }
'.rotate-180': { rotate: 180 }

// Component(s): For the Animation Component
// Property(ies): rotate ( Negative values )
'.-rotate-0': { rotate: 0 }
'.-rotate-1': { rotate: -1 }
'.-rotate-2': { rotate: -2 }
'.-rotate-3': { rotate: -3 }
'.-rotate-6': { rotate: -6 }
'.-rotate-12': { rotate: -12 }
'.-rotate-45': { rotate: -45 }
'.-rotate-90': { rotate: -90 }
'.-rotate-180': { rotate: -180 }
```
